name: Leadership
text: While Leadership is committed to a skill test being performed by another investigator, Leadership gains [willpower] [wild].

name: "I've had worseâ€¦"
text:
Fast. Play when you are dealt damage and/or horror.
Cancel up to 5 damage and/or horror just dealt to you. Then, gain that many resources.

name: Strange Solution
text:
Researched. Uses (4 supplies).
[action] Spend 1 supply: Heal 2 damage from an investigator at your location.

name: Strange Solution
text: Researched. Uses (3 supplies). [action] Spend 1 supply: Fight. Attack with a base [combat] skill of 6. This attack deals +2 damage.

name: Strange Solution
text: Researched. Uses (4 supplies). [action] Spend 1 supply: Evade. Evade with a base [agility] skill of 6.

flavor:
"Murph, you know full well that The Rat would snitch on anyone, at any time, for anything, truth be damned if the price was right."
-Jason Marker, Investigators of Arkham Horror
name: Joey "The Rat" Vigil
text: [free] Spend 1 resource: Choose an [[Item]] asset from your hand and play it (paying its cost).

name: Ace in the Hole
text:
Exceptional. Fast. Play only during your turn.
You may take an additional 3 actions this turn.

name: Moonlight Ritual
text: Remove all doom from 1 card you control.

flavor: Only by standing firm against the darkness can we live to see the light of another day.
name: Fearless
text: If this skill test is successful, heal 1 horror (2 horror instead if it succeeds by 2 or more).

name: Jewel of Aureolus
text: [reaction] After a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol is revealed during a skill test at your location, exhaust Jewel of Aureolus: Draw 1 card or gain 2 resources.

name: A Chance Encounter
text: Choose an [[Ally]] asset in any player's discard pile. Put that asset into play under your control. At the end of the round, if that asset is still in play, discard it.

name: Stroke of Luck
text:
Commit only to a skill test you are performing.
After revealing chaos tokens for this test, you may choose to exile Stroke of Luck. If you do, this test is automatically successful (unless a [auto_fail] token was revealed).

flavor: There's nothing quite like the feel of silk against your skin.
name: Fine Clothes
text: Reduce the difficulty of skill tests you perform during 'parley' actions by 2.

name: Moment of Respite
text:
Play only if there are no enemies at your location.
Heal 3 horror and draw 1 card.
